website_summaries.verdict: No added ingredients in this peanut butter powder, giving you an all-natural option for recipes.
pros: Only uses non-GMO peanuts grown in the United States
Has no added salt or sugar
Can be incorporated into vegan recipes
Has a reasonable price per ounce of powder
cons: Flavor will be a bit bland for some users, meaning it may not deliver the taste you want in recipes

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!! Household staple!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who LOVES peanut butter, but also eats low carb and watches their calorie intake...this is the PERFECT product!! This company makes no attempt to hide ingredients or fillers...what you see is what you get. Powder peanuts...no salt, no sugar. 100% goodness! I can make as much or as little as I want, make it as thick or as creamy as I want, can make it with water or almond milk, and can add my own stevia to make it as sweet as I want. Spreads wonderfully and works well in baking too! Great price point for as much product that you get. Will continue to order!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Tastes yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my very green smoothies. I use a lot of romaine, kale, dandelion, cilantro, parsley, and flax with chia seeds. That tastes kinda awfully bitter. So a bit of Peanut Powder helps! Ideally, I'd like to use more, but I'm on a budget. I also like adding a bit of water and dipping fresh banana in. REALLY cool drink: fresh or frozen banana, almond milk (great source of calcium), Peanut Butter Powder, and maybe some greens (not too many), ice cubes and wow wow wow! Healthy and yummy!! I could live on that if I had the money!!
customer_reviews.author: TrixieTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Most people use this in smoothies. I mix it with water to get a super low fat peanut butter! I like this because it is salt and sugar free. I can add as much as I want and suit it to our taste AND use good quality salt and unprocessed sugar.Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Container not full
customer_reviews.text: Will not be buying this from amazon again. The container is unopened and only 3/4 full. It’s says net weight 2 lbs...I weighed it and it was 1.5lbs Including the weight of the container. And this item isn’t eligible for return or exchange
customer_reviews.author: brad jahnke

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be similar to other powdered peanut butters where you can mix with water to create a spreadable peanut butter. If that is what you are looking for please know this is NOT the product for you. It did work as far as consistency goes, but it was so bland! No taste whatsoever, a waste of money. I suppose it may still be fine to put in a smoothie or such, but I don't use powdered peanut butter for that purpose. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Loren family

customer_reviews.title: PBJ Shake Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I used my immersion blender on some tart cherries, blueberries, and cane sugar, then blended in 3 scoops of this powder. It tasted like heaven! Perfect liquid peanut butter and jelly sandwich! 3 scoops comes out to about a dollar a smoothie. Not bad! I'll be ordering a larger size to save money long-term if this becomes a dietary staple. Right now I want to eat it all day everyday, but I'm sure I'll get sick of it.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Holli

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what it says it is! Pure nuts!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I never buy food online... cuz who knows where it’s actually coming from, but I gave it a shot and I’m so glad I did! I put it in my shakes every morning! I’ve bought this 3 times now! When I’ve run out and have had to use peanut butter as a replacement I usually end up not feeling so great! (Peanuts are legumes after all) but the peanut powder never seems to bother me! Unless you use more than 3 scoops in one sitting lol
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!!!!!!! Here is my recipe: 1 scoop of Naked PB, 1 scoop of Naked Whey, 4 squirts of Stevia Sweetleaf Chocolate Flavor, and about a cup and half of Unsweetend Silk coconut milk(The vanilla unsweetened version is great.). Blend in the vitamix. Serve. You are good to go for 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alf

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is my first whirl with a powdered peanut butter and it's actually been really good. I primarily use it for smoothies/shakes so I can't advise on it as a spread or sprinkle in say Yogurt or something but it gets the job done for what I use it for. My only complaint with the product is the scoop which has a very short handle making it difficult to scoop without making a mess especially towards the bottom of the container. The reason this is frustrating is I've used their Creatine as well (similar container) but the scope is longer and more appropriately sized.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty good! I’ve been using it mostly in smoothies where it adds a light peanut flavor and keeps me feeling full longer. I’ve also added it to recipes that call for peanut butter to enhance the peanut butter flavor without adding more fat. I’ve even added it to overnight oats - also good! I’ll definitely be buying it again, but not to add water and try to turn it into peanut butter. Saving that for an emergency food moment!
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Great, Low-Fat Alternative to Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.text: My family and I really like this product. It's cheaper than PB2, but still satisfies the taste for peanut butter. My wife uses it in her morning smoothie while I enjoy it for when my morning oatmeal calls for peanut butter. It is not as flavorful as traditional peanut butter, but that can be fixed with some experimentation. I use a 1/4 teaspoon of pure maple syrup on occasion when I use it for apple slices or where it isn't blended in a smoothie or oatmeal. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: jeffreywp

customer_reviews.title: Really good peanut butter alternative
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this to PBFit. No, it's not a sweet. Because PBFit contains coconut palm sugar. And has 20 more calories per serving. So it is a little more bland. But by no means is it bad. It mixes exactly the same. Has a strong roasted peanut flavor. Overall this is a good powdered peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly powdered peanut particles proves perfect protein powder partner!
customer_reviews.text: There's a LOT of powdered peanut butter here.. and nothing else. I add a scoop of this to my protein shakes in the morning and it adds a real nice bit of peanut-e flavor. Which is nice, if you like peanuts and I do!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Morphis

customer_reviews.title: I'm stunned!😍
customer_reviews.text: I'm stunned. Just had my first protein shake with it, I thought I was totally going to be able to taste the difference between this powder and real peanut butter and I absolutely couldn't. I mostly drink my peanut butter in morning shakes and this is going to save me so many calories and money! I just did a cost analysis and this is going to be about half the price for me compared to the natural peanut butter jars I was religiously buying. Consider me converted. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ScShello

customer_reviews.title: Rancid taste.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to writing this review. I opened this stuff the day I got it and It was awful tasting, a very putrid bitter taste.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Best, Double Peanut Butter, Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product! LETSSSS GOOOOO NAKED NUTRITION! I make a double nut butter to reduce fat content and add more protein toward my but butter. In a food processor mix roasted unsalted peanuts with dashes of Nusalt’s sodium free salt. To then place two to three heaping scoops of that peanut butter into a bowl with half a cup of soymilk, almond milk, rice milk, hemp milk, cashew milk, or macadamia nut milk. Place as much schools of NAKED PB POWDER into the bowl with any sweetener.( I’d prefer nunaturals stevia syrup regular or vanilla) Mix throughly. Add more milk for a creamy butter. Add more powder for a tougher stiff butter. BAM Double Peanut Butter
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I use this is cooking, not for body building or protein shakes, and it great. I can throw a scoop or two in to make Thai or other Asian sauces to add a peanut flavor without all the fat of actual peanut butter. Of course it doesn't have the texture and richness of using peanut butter, but expecting an identical result would be stupid. This adds a strong, pure peanut flavor and it doesn't have sugar like many other peanut powders. What you pay for is peanut and nothing else. I will definitely be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hodgdon

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, pure, simple and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Peanut powder is fabulous in smoothies, added to peanut butter cookies for extra flavor, and in milkshakes -- also wonderful sprinkled over buttered popcorn (try it, you'll like it). The opportunities to experiment are endless. Makes you realize how inflated prices are for smaller quantities. Stored in the refrigerator (not a must, but I do) this will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just peanuts
customer_reviews.text: If you like a peanut butter like Crazy Richard's ( 100% peanuts) but without the fat, this is a good choice. You can add your own oil or spread it dry. It can feel dry or powdery in the mouth, but the taste is pure peanut. And two pounds is a LOT.
customer_reviews.author: mark r. gallimore

customer_reviews.title: Lacks flavor
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be nearly tasteless. I was looking for a low fat, lower calorie way to eat peanut butter. This product is not it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Almost fat free and no SUGAR!
customer_reviews.text: THANKS NAKED PB. Extremely versatile and great value. I add a pinch of salt and a teaspoon or so of Erythritol. Erythritol is a non nutritive non sweetener that does not impact blood sugar or insulin levels. It does not alter gut bacteria negatively and published evidence also shows that erythritol can act as an antioxidant and that it may improve endothelial function in people with type 2 diabetes. I just want my peanut butter totally clean so I can do whatever I want with it not what the s idiot sugar pushes to do with it. Yes, I did say idiot sugar pushers. THANKS AGAIN Naked PB!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price😎
customer_reviews.text: Product tastes great. I first thought it was opened because product looked like it was not full to the top. There was a seal and then I realized it is a powder and it probably just settled .I also weighed the product and it was correct excluding the canister. For those of you who buy this just be aware product does this. For quality and price I give you all the stars. Great product to keep your sodium down. Love mixing this in my smoothie with bananas and soy milk.
customer_reviews.author: dion

customer_reviews.title: Not Peanut butter but liquid peanut.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that we could just add water and would have cream peanut butter, but according with the method of preparing, after done is liquid and taste TERRIBLE!I will RETURN it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it in about a million recipes, it lasts forever (okay, 2 years) and it’s healthy and inexpensive. A few of my favorite ways to use this are to mix it into overnight oats, put it in a banana smoothie, or use it in my favorite Senegalese peanut stew. It adds protein and a creamy flavor without all the bulk and excessive oil in traditional peanut butter. It also mixes well in waffle batter, cookies, and other baked goods.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this Naked PB powder. I am on WW and I use this along with Greek Yogurt and some splenda and a pinch of salt or I mix it without the yogurt for a quick snack with some apples or oatmeal. I also like to add it to my smoothies. You can make it as thick or thin as you want it. I like being able to control the sweetness and saltiness of a peanut butter. Great product. Ships fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelled bad. Tasted bad.
customer_reviews.text: The product has a smell that is somewhat off-putting as soon as you open the container. I used it in a couple desserts and a smoothie and was grossed out each times. It didn't dissolve well either.
customer_reviews.author: Elvin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Potent Peanut-y Taste
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for peanut powder that didn't have added sugar (not easy to find surprisingly) but low and behold this sucker shows up in my search! The peanut flavor is great and it incorporates very well with canola oil. When it's put in overnight oats with banana it mixes with the fruit to give a naturally creamy texture (would highly recommend: 2-3 Tbsp PB powder, 1 cup water or preferred kind of milk, 1/3 cup oats, and a whole banana overnight in a Tupperware container-- you can add a pinch of salt and a few drops of monk fruit for extra sweetness and flavor but I find it's enough without it).
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Delightful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most delicious powder peanut butter I have ever eaten. Just wow. I'm doing keto lifestyle and this is my favorite snack. I mix mine with butter. Yummy and smooth! Makes great keto reese cup knock offs too!
customer_reviews.author: LARUEBELL

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste good
customer_reviews.text: I add water to PB2 each morning and have it on a banana with my coffee pre workout. I have always used PB2 or Big Lots has a brand called fresh finds that is also good and in a larger container. Tried this naked brand for the first time because I liked the ingredients and a little more protein but it does not taste good ...and now I bought a huge thing of it lol Might taste better in baking ...but not the way I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best powdered peanut butter on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE organic peanut butter! You cannot beat the value, or purity. Dry roasted peanuts is the only ingredient. Great for hcg, keto, diabetes, low fat/ cholesterol, vegetarian, vegan diets.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: RANCID SMELL/CUSTOMER SERVICE TONE-DEAF
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Naked PB and used it for a couple of months. I always thought it had an odd smell. When my daughter visited me recently, I asked her to smell the powder. She immediately said that it SMELLED RANCID!!!! I communicated with customer service and they refused to rectify the situation. I am not unfamiliar with the smell of peanut powder having used Jiff Peanut Powder for years. I now use Hoosier Hill Farm Peanut Butter Powder and it has a peanut aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G Fruehman

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting, no sugar added powdered PB
customer_reviews.text: Lover this. I have it on subscribe and save. My husband puts it in his smoothies. I use it in baking all the time - cake, cookies, breading, sauces, etc. Believe it or not, I bought it because my dog has pancreatitis and can no longer have "real" peanut putter, which I made his treats out of (with PB, pumpkin and oatmeal). Now I make his treats with this and he can have his low-fat, vet-approved treats!
customer_reviews.author: Carter7

customer_reviews.title: Stick with PB two
customer_reviews.text: I have always used PB two, and has a lot more flavor than this brand. This brand is extremely bland ,Stick with PB two
customer_reviews.author: christine vitello

customer_reviews.title: Tasty peanut powder at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Peanut powder without any sugar or salt added. Tastes great in smoothies and protein shakes. I've been on a diet using meal replacement shakes and this adds some flavor and thickness to the shake. It is is a good price compared to the other well-known brands. Also very good is to mix the peanut powder with a zero calorie flavor syrup like Jordan's skinny syrups or DaVinci brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Less Sugar
customer_reviews.text: We use coconut oil to re-hydrate to the desired consistency. Also, if you use a Traditional Balsamic Vinegar, made by Veronica Foods, out of Oakland, CA (best there is!) it tastes like peanut butter and jelly!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Travel Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to hide but great taste!
customer_reviews.text: The quick review: there's only one ingredient: roasted peanuts. It's low in sugar, fat and has 6g of protein. You can even bake with it! I decided to try this as it was a special deal on Prime Day and was looking for a low-sugar powdered peanut butter to mix in with my protein powder for smoothies. Let me tell you, the peanut butter flavor comes though, mixing well with the protein powder, fruit, milk and ice I like to mix together. The taste is terrific. Though I haven't baked with it yet, I can't wait to try it the next time I make pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Bluhonu

customer_reviews.title: Great Vegan Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to use pea protein powder for a vegan source for my smoothies and buckwheat groats but I can't stand it. In contrast, peanut butter powder is more like homebase, a flavor that I'm used to and that I love. It mixes well with smoothies and my buckwheat, adds protein to my snacks and meals and is affordable. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. JEFFREY MCMAHON

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pb powder tastes great. When mixed with my chocolate protein shake it tastes like a Reese’s candy shake. Also mixed it with sugar free cool whip to make a peanut butter ‘ice cream’. I think the possibilities are endless. If you love peanut butter, this is a great substitute without all the calories. It’s also a huge container.
customer_reviews.author: SGarner

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Mild flavor. No added junk!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. You get A LOT of powder for your buck. I mainly use this for my nutri shakes. While the PB flavor isn't as strong as "real" PB, it adds a subtle PB flavor without all the added sugars and oils. With that understanding, this is a great product. If you are looking for a sweet peanut flavor, this may not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: So bland and awful
customer_reviews.text: I love adding peanut butter powder to smoothies or adding some water to it and dipping an apple. However this particular brand is so bland, literally tastes like water (and I didn't add too much water). I'm so displeased and it's quite unfortunate that the company doesn't accept returns. I will not be purchasing this again, and I highly recommend PB2 or Peanut Butter & Company's versions.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: My favorite PB
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love Naked Nutrition. There are so many products packed with preservatives and sweeteners, but this company keeps it simple. The Naked PB...man I love this stuff. I use it in nearly every smoothie I make. It's less fat than spreadable peanut butter, but carries the same taste. Also, it lasts FOREVER. One scoop is all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kraegel

customer_reviews.title: Why do they call this Powdered Peanut Butter??
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted which is Peanut Powder not Peanut Butter powder. I use this in fat bombs that I make myself as a sort of chocolate peanut candy. Thank You So Much for offering this.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My liver doesn't function so I am on liquids to ease the pain. I love peanut butter. This is super yummy. I add it to almond milk and random frozen fruits. Goes well with a lot of different flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily big jar
customer_reviews.text: The powder tastes fine, but this jar is way too big. Makes it really hard to scoop, especially when you get towards the bottom. The scoop that comes with it has the tiniest handle. Even when full, there is tons of empty space at the top of the jar. Takes up a lot of room in my pantry too.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Just Peanuts!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for protein to add to morning smoothies but I wanted a simple ingredient list. This stuff is perfect. It adds a nice flavor to my smoothie and you can't beat the ingredient list - roasted peanuts. Nothing else. I appreciate that it has no salt. I'm on a salt restricted diet so I pay close attention to everything I eat.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin

customer_reviews.title: Taste just as good as regular PB!!!
customer_reviews.text: haven't really used this for peanut butter sandwiches or anything else really, I use it in my protein shakes to replace jif & its honestly good. I add many things to my shakes like; protein, oatmeal & bananas. Even with all that you can taste the peanut butter like regular greasy peanut butter. I love peanut butter since I was a kid & I love this as a healthy adult!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Montes

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nicely priced item, but it lacks the peanut flavor that another brand PB has.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely priced item, but it lacks the peanut flavor that another brand PB has. So, the cost is good, but the overall quality is less I feel. It doesn't taste bad, it just doesn't taste as good. I use these in my milkshakes and I can hardly tell that I have added it to the shake. So, I will most likely go back to the other and better tasting brand.
customer_reviews.author: LifesavrTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this! I use it almost every single day in my Greek yogurt. You can also mix this with some salt and a little sweetener, and a little bit of water to make your own low carb, low calorie, low-fat peanut butter that tastes just the way you like it. Buy this, you won't be disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Gina Carmack

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of powdered peanut butter manufacturers and this one tastes the most like peanuts. Somehow the others have an off taste but this is possibly fresher. Mix some with water and a touch of salt and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: Enormous!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I didn’t realize when I ordered that it’s 2 pounds-worth! It comes in an enormous jar like bulk protein powder. Anyway, I love that it’s purely peanuts with no sugar or other additives. I will use it in my Huel shakes along with Cocotropic cocoa/mushroom powder. To save space in the kitchen, I transferred some of it to a mason jar with a screw-top lid for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Allison T.

customer_reviews.title: I will buy this again
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a good price. It has less peanut butter taste than I thought it would, but this is my first powdered PB purchase, so I am unable to compare that to other brands. Also, the huge jar could have been reduced by at least 1/4 as there was lots of empty space. Also, I didn't find the measuring spoon for a few weeks as it was buried about halfway down in the jar.
customer_reviews.author: Cubs Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great product, great taste!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to use as a protein addition and was hoping to use as a flour replacement because I have a tree nut allergy and most low carb, gluten free, yadda yadda recipes use almond flour or some other but I can’t have. I must say I am loving this product. Pure, simple and delicious. For those with issues of it tasting bland, you have to add the flavor that’s the benefit of purchasing it Naked! I think product is a great value and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste good at all to me
customer_reviews.text: I have used another brand I liked it because I used it to spread on bananas, rice cakes, etc. So this product had good ratings, and I thought I could eat it the same way; I don't make smoothies or moix it in with other things. Therefore , I was greatly disappointed with the taste because I can't use it the way I wanted. Otherwise, I like the idea of no additives--great on the score.
customer_reviews.author: DRPC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is exactly what you would expect - clean, pure pb powder with no additives. If you assume it will taste just like pb you will be disappointed, but if you compare to other pb powders with sweeteners I think you will be pleased. I add a pinch of turbinado sugar and salt to each batch I make, and keep it in my fridge to replace my pb addiction. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Niemka

customer_reviews.title: Naked PB in a Nutshell!
customer_reviews.text: Just received it one day ago and only used it once in a smoothie. I liked that it is a 2 pound jar of powdered 100% roasted peanuts according to the list of ingredients and 1 gram of sugar per serving (an item I want to reduce in my diet). It does not have the sweet taste of other brands or the mess from peanut butter paste. But, at least I know my body received pure peanut butter. I highly recommend “Naked PB”. -DMC
customer_reviews.author: DEB

customer_reviews.title: Good Product...lite on that PB flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Although nutritionally better than the real stuff, it just doesn't delivered that full peanut butter flavor. Mixes great in my Ninja Pro with Almond milk. Tastes good but I think I'll get a jar of real PB next time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Pure pb powder as the name states.
customer_reviews.text: Great product - I often use it to make chocolate pb banana smoothies or to make peanut butter oatmeal (with a teaspoon of honey for sweetness), tastes great! Doesn't have that chalky taste/tester that a lot of powders have. Not a very strong taste in the powdered form, but enough that it is a great substitute in recipes to add a little more protein and not as much fat.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Pure. Nice and Plain.
customer_reviews.text: I would compare this to the Crazy Richard's Pure Peanut Butter Powder in consistency. The taste is a little different; like when tasting two different roasts of coffee from the same manufacturer... different but still good. Nice and plain with No added sugar or salt; so I add my own when it comes to recipes. It mixes and blends very well.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Just peanuts. Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a big jar & I bought it because it’s JUST PEANUTS. The others add salt, sugar, etc,& I didn’t want that. This is a very good value & I’m using for sauces and smoothies, not yet just as peanut butter, but it taste like peanuts in my recipes. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Kimadoo

customer_reviews.title: Forget PB Fit! NAKED PB is the good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: No added sugars or salt - just powdered peanuts. I add about a 1/8 tsp of salt per scoop and it's indistinguishable from jar peanut butter. I even tested this on my Dad, who is a Jiffy peanut butter purest, and he didn't notice! That was the real WIN! It's a great way to add flavor to a smoothie without adding extra sugars. Great product - Unbeatable price (and I've searched) - Amazing taste - HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Anne Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: PB tastes good. No complaints there but I gave 4 stars instead of 5 because almost a quarter of the product in the canister was missing. Why such a large container if it’s not going to be filled all of the way?
customer_reviews.author: Shannon N. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has only one ingredient, no fillers or additives. Alot of reviews complained about the flavor but it just tastes like peanuts to me. It is great in smoothies, oatmeal and pancakes. I use it everyday. Highly recommended and will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get great value but the flavor is off
customer_reviews.text: I changed my usual PB powder brand for this one because of the size and value. Instead of having to buy several small tubs, I can get this bad boy for a fair price. BUT, after tasting it, I did not like it. It tastes like burned peanuts, not roasted. The flavor is unpleasant. If you drink it with your protein shake, it is ok. But alone, it is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Guillermo Cassanello Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Get it... won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It gives you a peanut butter taste perfectly for smoothies without adding artifical sweeteners. I get bad side effects even with stevia and monk fruit. I am vegan and use their pure pea protein powder and need to add this and real vanilla to make it taste good. But the calories and fat slashed out are perfect as I am a bikini competitor and want to stay lean.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: You better like a lot of this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge jar. Tastes good and the product is fluffy. Container says 100% nuts with no sugar or preservatives. If you are just trying this out for the first time, you may want to think about getting a smaller container.
customer_reviews.author: Expert_Review

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product!! I had researched several brands. I wanted to a powdered peanut butter that was all natural and did not contain any added sugars. This fit my needs perfectly! I add the powder to lots of things - shakes, yogurt, etc. I love the taste!! And now that I know that the company donates to charities around the world to combat childhood hunger, I intend to continue to be a customer. Great product, great mission!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great for smoothies and baking
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this in my smoothies. The taste is super yummy and not too strong. I also made some chickpea brownies and added this to help cover the bean taste and it worked perfectly. I don’t know about making a paste from it (without the natural oil I would think it would be gritty), but it is great to add flavor to other things.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Healy

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I've used PB2, which started to have an odd sweetness to it - so, I ordered a drum that could last years. It definitely tastes like peanuts and nothing else. However, for my tastes, it needs salt.
customer_reviews.author: CityMouse

customer_reviews.title: but it adds a great flavor. I have used other powdered peanut butter ...
customer_reviews.text: Just peanuts and just delicious! I have to admit, I have only used the peanut butter powder a few times in my shakes, but it adds a great flavor. I have used other powdered peanut butter before, and they all had added sugar. The 'missing' sugar is not noticed as far as flavor goes. I want to thank the producers of Naked PB for creating a great product without the superfluous sugar!
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my protein shakes!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to bulk up, and wanted a little extra protein with my shakes. This PB powder is great! It isn't an overpowering flavor and isn't at all chalky or grainy. It blends well with my shakes, whether it's in a nutribullet or blender bottle. I will note that the scoop is small so I typically use two scoops- mainly because I really like the PB taste. 10/10 would recommend for any peanut butter lover or person trying to get in some extra protein!
customer_reviews.author: Gwenyth Griggs

customer_reviews.title: Breathes life into my protein shakes
customer_reviews.text: My protein shake needed a little oomph in the flavor department, this fixed it right up. Reasonable protein content, and tastes like peanuts/peanut butter
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!! Just peanuts!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful peanut flour for baking!! I used it to make peanut butter balls & baking in general!! NO SUGAR!! No additional additives....just peanuts!! I can’t say enough about how good this product is!! Thanks so much!!
customer_reviews.author: newbe reader

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchase
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchase for this peanut butter powder. Love the fact that it doesn't have any sugar, not like PB. And nutrition factor is wonderful, and taste is still very good. I use it everyday in my morning smoothie. Shipped the day I ordered, and got delivered the second day. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Naked PB Disciple
customer_reviews.text: Naked PB is versatile. I put it on my morning granola, or oatmeal, or yogurt and fruit combo, and add to my protein shakes after working out. When traveling on business, I take a ziplock baggy full along with me to supplement road food that is typically not sufficiently healthy. Great product. On my second order now.
customer_reviews.author: John Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this powder for my protein shakes. Being on a vegan high protein diet this not only bumps up the flavor of the smoothie, it adds some protein for my diet. Blends well, haven't needed to grab a frosting spatula and scrape it off the side of the blender. I overall would say its a great tasting peanut butter powder, great value and straight forward ingredients. I will be purchasing again
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Smells Stale
customer_reviews.text: Does not have a good PB flavor and worse yet it had a stale odor. The stale smell over powered smoothies and cereal and I cannot get myself to use this powder.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. I love it
customer_reviews.text: Tastes awesome. There IS sugar in this as peanuts naturally contain sugar but I’m happy that there’s no additional sugar or sodium added. This is great in smoothies and I mostly use them to make protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Joland7000

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love the price and that there aren’t additives. I add this to my morning chocolate protein shake and it tastes like a Reese’s peanut butter cup! I also love supporting corporations that give to charities.
customer_reviews.author: dubs

customer_reviews.title: Bitter taste at first.
customer_reviews.text: My nutritionist recommended this to me. She wanted me to replace PB2 with this because there is no added sugar or preservatives. It is definitely something you will have to give your tastebuds time to adjust to, but it’s worth it! Decent taste, good price, and really healthy for you!
customer_reviews.author: jessica freeman

customer_reviews.title: perfect product
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid fitness person (intense weight train 5x week, intense cardio 45 min-1hr 4x week. I do doubles 2x week) and I use this product daily in my diet (six 500 calorie meals each day) and it is perfection. One ingredient, lots of protein and still a small amt of healthy fat. It mixes with nonfat/plain yogurt and casein protein to make a sludge that spreads on things like bananas, whole grain bread and more.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mires

customer_reviews.title: you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It has no added sugar and is very versatile. I use it as my protein source in smoothies, and mix it with a little water to use as a dip for apples. I always travel with it in case I need some quick, healthy protein. They also give part of their proceeds to charities that fight childhood hunger!🥰
customer_reviews.author: N. G. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I recently went vegan and this is a life saver! I also lift weights regularly, so I need extra protein. The easiest and most delicious way I've found to get protein! And there is no added sugar
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy 😋
customer_reviews.text: Love this pb powder! I make and add to protein shakes and make sauces and dressing out of it too. Sometimes I add just a little bit of water to scoop and just eat it like pudding. It’s very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to add to smoothies. It's important to me to have a good idea the origin of what I'm eating, and what is in it. I don't like added sugar in any food products, I'd rather add it myself so I know how much sugar I'm eating. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Williams

customer_reviews.title: basically just crushed peanuts
customer_reviews.text: But that's a good thing. Super simple and clean, gives you great peanut flavor. I only use it in protein shakes when I'm mixing things in anyway, so can't speak to how well it mixes in with other things.
customer_reviews.author: sw21788

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to health line
customer_reviews.text: never an issue. Weather this or another brand, all similar in taste. This is just peanuts. No, its not jiffy, but I don't buy for the extra additives of those brands and therefore don't expect the taste of them. We use this in protein shakes, pancakes, cakes, cookies, oatmeal, mix with cereal, flavor milk, etc. (flour substitute). For the amount and cost...well satisfied. never had a bad shipment and this is about #4.
customer_reviews.author: ako

customer_reviews.title: Great Tasting Product~
customer_reviews.text: Headline: Naked PB I love the Peanut Butter Naked protein. It is great in shakes and smoothies as my source of protein and a meal replacement. I add frozen fruit or a couple fresh eggs for a great eggnog. This product is nutrition at its finest! I purchase the 5 lb. size best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: BDK

customer_reviews.title: Best Peanut Butter Powder on the Market
customer_reviews.text: This is the only peanut butter powder I can find that does not have any added oils or sugar. I am pretty picky when it comes to added ingredients, so this was a game changer for me. While the powdered peanut butter does not taste like Jif (b/c Jif adds a bunch of sugar and hydrogenated oils), it still tastes like peanuts without being overbearing. I put it in my smoothies, oatmeal, and paleo pancakes, and it lasted me a few months, so the price was definitely worth it. I will definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and easy to prepare!
customer_reviews.text: I eat this a few times a week- great calorie saver and I love it! ADDICTIVE!
customer_reviews.author: #1 BOOK & MOVIE FAN!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I mix it with my protein shakes. I haven’t mixed it with anything else but the flavor is great and I can see a lot of other uses for it. Definitely worth the money. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: Piker22

customer_reviews.title: Good for diet people
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it doesn’t add sugar and sodium. While the flavor is not that good compared to another brand of reduced fat peanut powder... maybe superfood do don’t have good taste so I will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Xin Tan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for post workout shake or regular smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This powdered PB has a far superior taste than the other powdered PB in the market (in my opinion). It is smooth, blends well in my post workout shakes, and has no additives. Definitely a must if you like that peanut butter flavor in any recipe. I enjoy many of the NAKED branded items (as you see in the picture).
customer_reviews.author: Lou P

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make chocolate peanut butter protein shakes. But, I have found that this a wonderful addition to baking anything from brownies, cakes and cookies. I even made peanut butter banana bread with it.
customer_reviews.author: BabyDoll

customer_reviews.title: One of the best
customer_reviews.text: I've used other PB powders before, but I think this is one of the best. I like it so much I subscribed to it. I use it most mornings in my steel cut oats, I also use it frequently in smoothies and for low carb baking.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Love, love Naked PB
customer_reviews.text: naked PB checks all the boxes for my husband and I: no fillers or additives, just peanuts. An easy way to get protein without the oil. We do not reconstitute it, we add the powder to our morning smoothies and for flavoring and to my baking for flavor mostly.
customer_reviews.author: Arizsona

customer_reviews.title: Just peanuts. No sugar!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent powder. I like the fact there is no sugar added. It's just peanuts, plain and simple. Obviously, this makes it not sweet, like some other brands so eating it on its own might not appeal to everyone. It's amazing in smoothies and baked goods!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Polgara

customer_reviews.title: Great mix-in
customer_reviews.text: I use this for smoothies and in my morning oatmeal. With the oatmeal, I add a scoop of Naked PB, a Tblsp of cocoa, a Tbsp of maple syrup and a Tbsp of beet root powder. It looks like red velvet oatmeal and tastes wonderful. I love that this pb powder doesn't have any added sugar. I buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Like no other!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this powder. I have tried others, but this one seems to have the most natural taste of them all. NO sugar nor added ingredients. My favorite thing in the morning is to mix it into my greek yogurt. Simply the BEST! I have bought this product many times and will continue doing so. Also the PRICE can not be beat! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: gamine

customer_reviews.title: Weird texture but good for drinks
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something more similar to PB2 which has a texture that's closer to real peanut butter. This is so smooth it's a little weird to me. Plus, the flavor is pretty bland by itself, i.e. on top of apples vs. mixed in a drink. Not bad but not what I was looking for. Also, 2lbs is HUGE. Comically large (but that's my fault for not realizing).
customer_reviews.author: J True

customer_reviews.title: Great value and flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor. I had been buying a similar product at Walmart in a smaller size and seemed to be running out too often. So I tried this large size and love it. I put two tablespoons on plain oatmeal every morning and need no other flavorings or sweeteners.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M. Gotway

product_meta.title: 2lbs of 100% Premium Powdered Peanut Butter from US Farms – Bulk, Only Roasted Peanuts, Vegan, No Additives, Preservative Free, No Salt, No Sugar - 76 Servings - Naked PB
feature_bullets: ONLY ONE INGREDIENT: 100% Non-GMO Roasted Peanuts with no additives. Naked PB contains no added sugar or salt and is gmo, dairy, soy and preservative free.
MADE IN THE USA: Our powdered peanut butter is sourced exclusively from peanuts grown on US Farms and is processed and packaged in the US as well.
MAXIMUM NUTRITION: 6g of Protein, 4g of Carbs, 50 Calories, and 0.9g of BCAAs (branched-chain amino acids) per serving.
HEAVY METALS TESTED: Our All Natural Powdered Peanut Butter is independently tested by third-parties for heavy metals.
VEGAN PROTEIN FOOD: Naked Powdered Peanut Butter is an excellent source of low fat protein for vegans and can be incorporated into savory or sweet recipes.
